amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to supporting efficient resourcing for the Asia rebalance policy.

vote.text: Amendment SA 449 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 449 proposed by Senator Gardner. (consideration: CR S1971; text: CR S1971) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to supporting efficient resourcing for the Asia rebalance policy.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 449 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 449 proposed by Senator Gardner.
